scripts.deploy: export AWS_PROFILE=personal && npm run build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name webfg-gm-app --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`WebsiteBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text) --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudfront list-distributions --query 'DistributionList.Items[?Aliases.Items[?contains(@,`webfg-gm.phnks.com`)]].Id' --output text) --paths "/*"
